verses.verse: Πρεσβυτέρους <WG4245> Presbyterous [the] elders [τοὺς] <WG3588> tous - ( SBL, NE, and WH I appeal therefore to the elders) ἐν <WG1722> en among ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin you : παρακαλῶ <WG3870> parakalō I appeal to ( Instructions to Elders) ὁ <WG3588> ho [As] συμπρεσβύτερος <WG4850> sympresbyteros a fellow elder , καὶ <WG2532> kai - μάρτυς <WG3144> martys a witness τῶν <WG3588> tōn of τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Χριστοῦ <WG5547> Christou Christ’s παθημάτων <WG3804> pathēmatōn sufferings , ὁ <WG3588> ho - καὶ <WG2532> kai and τῆς <WG3588> tēs of the μελλούσης <WG3195> mellousēs vvv ἀποκαλύπτεσθαι <WG601> apokalyptesthai to be revealed , δόξης <WG1391> doxēs glory κοινωνός <WG2844> koinōnos a partaker

ποιμάνατε <WG4165> poimanate Be shepherds τὸ <WG3588> to - ἐν <WG1722> en [that is] among ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin you , ποίμνιον <WG4168> poimnion flock τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou of God’s ‹ἐπισκοποῦντες› <WG1983> episkopountes watching over them ( NE and WH do not include watching over them.) μὴ <WG3361> mē not ἀναγκαστῶς <WG317> anankastōs out of compulsion , ἀλλὰ <WG235> alla but ἑκουσίως <WG1596> hekousiōs will ; ( WH, BYZ, and TR but willingly) κατὰ <WG2596> kata because it is Θεόν <WG2316> Theon God’s μηδὲ <WG3366> mēde not αἰσχροκερδῶς <WG147> aischrokerdōs out of greed , ἀλλὰ <WG235> alla but προθύμως <WG4290> prothymōs out of eagerness ;

μηδ’ <WG3366> mēd’ not ὡς <WG5613> hōs vvv κατακυριεύοντες <WG2634> katakyrieuontes lording it over τῶν <WG3588> tōn - κλήρων <WG2819> klērōn those entrusted to you , ἀλλὰ <WG235> alla but τύποι <WG5179> typoi examples γινόμενοι <WG1096> ginomenoi being τοῦ <WG3588> tou to the ποιμνίου <WG4168> poimniou flock .

καὶ <WG2532> kai And [when] φανερωθέντος <WG5319> phanerōthentos appears , τοῦ <WG3588> tou the Ἀρχιποίμενος <WG750> Archipoimenos Chief Shepherd κομιεῖσθε <WG2865> komieisthe you will receive τὸν <WG3588> ton the ἀμαράντινον <WG262> amarantinon that will never fade away . τῆς <WG3588> tēs - δόξης <WG1391> doxēs of glory στέφανον <WG4735> stephanon crown

Ὁμοίως <WG3668> Homoiōs in the same way , ( Cast Your Cares on Him) νεώτεροι <WG3501> neōteroi Young men , ὑποτάγητε <WG5293> hypotagēte submit yourselves πρεσβυτέροις <WG4245> presbyterois to [your] elders . πάντες <WG3956> pantes all [of you] , δὲ <WG1161> de And ἀλλήλοις <WG240> allēlois toward one another , τὴν <WG3588> tēn - ταπεινοφροσύνην <WG5012> tapeinophrosynēn with humility ἐγκομβώσασθε <WG1463> enkombōsasthe clothe yourselves ὅτι <WG3754> hoti because , Ὁ <WG3588> Ho “ - Θεὸς <WG2316> Theos God ὑπερηφάνοις <WG5244> hyperēphanois [the] proud , ἀντιτάσσεται <WG498> antitassetai opposes ταπεινοῖς <WG5011> tapeinois to [the] humble .” ( (see also LXX)) δὲ <WG1161> de but δίδωσιν <WG1325> didōsin gives χάριν <WG5485> charin grace

Ταπεινώθητε <WG5013> Tapeinōthēte Humble yourselves , οὖν <WG3767> oun therefore , ὑπὸ <WG5259> hypo under τὴν <WG3588> tēn - κραταιὰν <WG2900> krataian mighty χεῖρα <WG5495> cheira hand , τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou God’s ἵνα <WG2443> hina so that ὑμᾶς <WG4771> hymas you . ὑψώσῃ <WG5312> hypsōsē He may exalt ἐν <WG1722> en in καιρῷ <WG2540> kairō [due] time

πᾶσαν <WG3956> pasan all τὴν <WG3588> tēn - μέριμναν <WG3308> merimnan anxiety ὑμῶν <WG4771> hymōn your ἐπιρίψαντες <WG1977> epiripsantes Cast ἐπ’ <WG1909> ep’ on αὐτόν <WG846> auton Him , ὅτι <WG3754> hoti because αὐτῷ <WG846> autō He μέλει <WG3199> melei cares περὶ <WG4012> peri for ὑμῶν <WG4771> hymōn you .

Νήψατε <WG3525> Nēpsate Be sober-minded γρηγορήσατε <WG1127> grēgorēsate [and] alert . ὁ <WG3588> ho the ἀντίδικος <WG476> antidikos adversary ὑμῶν <WG4771> hymōn Your διάβολος <WG1228> diabolos devil ὡς <WG5613> hōs like λέων <WG3023> leōn lion , ὠρυόμενος <WG5612> ōryomenos a roaring περιπατεῖ <WG4043> peripatei prowls around ζητῶν <WG2212> zētōn seeking τινα <WG5101> tina [someone] καταπιεῖν <WG2666> katapiein to devour .

ᾧ <WG3739> hō [him] , ἀντίστητε <WG436> antistēte Resist στερεοὶ <WG4731> stereoi [standing] firm τῇ <WG3588> tē in [your] πίστει <WG4102> pistei faith εἰδότες <WG1492> eidotes [and] in the knowledge that τὰ <WG3588> ta the αὐτὰ <WG846> auta same kinds τῶν <WG3588> tōn of παθημάτων <WG3804> pathēmatōn suffering . τῇ <WG3588> tē - ἐν <WG1722> en throughout τῷ <WG3588> tō the κόσμῳ <WG2889> kosmō world ὑμῶν <WG4771> hymōn your ἀδελφότητι <WG81> adelphotēti brothers ἐπιτελεῖσθαι <WG2005> epiteleisthai are undergoing

Ὁ <WG3588> Ho the ( Benediction and Farewell) δὲ <WG1161> de And Θεὸς <WG2316> Theos God πάσης <WG3956> pasēs of all χάριτος <WG5485> charitos grace , ὁ <WG3588> ho who καλέσας <WG2564> kalesas has called ὑμᾶς <WG4771> hymas you εἰς <WG1519> eis to τὴν <WG3588> tēn - αἰώνιον <WG166> aiōnion eternal αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou His δόξαν <WG1391> doxan glory ἐν <WG1722> en in Χριστῷ <WG5547> Christō Christ , ( BYZ and TR in Christ Jesus) ὀλίγον <WG3641> oligon for a little while , παθόντας <WG3958> pathontas [after you] have suffered αὐτὸς <WG846> autos will Himself καταρτίσει <WG2675> katartisei restore [you] , στηρίξει <WG4741> stērixei secure [you] , σθενώσει <WG4599> sthenōsei strengthen [you] , θεμελιώσει <WG2311> themeliōsei [and] establish [you] .

αὐτῷ <WG846> autō To Him [be] τὸ <WG3588> to the κράτος <WG2904> kratos power εἰς <WG1519> eis vvv τοὺς <WG3588> tous vvv αἰῶνας <WG165> aiōnas forever τῶν <WG3588> tōn [and] αἰώνων <WG165> aiōnōn ever . ἀμήν <WG281> amēn Amen .

Διὰ <WG1223> Dia Through Σιλουανοῦ <WG4610> Silouanou Silvanus , ( That is, Silas) ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin to you τοῦ <WG3588> tou a πιστοῦ <WG4103> pistou faithful ἀδελφοῦ <WG80> adelphou brother , ὡς <WG5613> hōs as λογίζομαι <WG3049> logizomai [whom] I regard δι’ <WG1223> di’ - ὀλίγων <WG3641> oligōn briefly , ἔγραψα <WG1125> egrapsa I have written παρακαλῶν <WG3870> parakalōn encouraging [you] καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἐπιμαρτυρῶν <WG1957> epimartyrōn testifying ταύτην <WG3778> tautēn [that] this εἶναι <WG1510> einai is ἀληθῆ <WG227> alēthē [the] true χάριν <WG5485> charin grace τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou of God . εἰς <WG1519> eis in ἣν <WG3739> hēn [it] . στῆτε <WG2476> stēte Stand firm

Ἀσπάζεται <WG782> Aspazetai sends you greetings ὑμᾶς <WG4771> hymas . . . , ἡ <WG3588> hē [The church] ἐν <WG1722> en in Βαβυλῶνι <WG897> Babylōni Babylon , ( Literally She in Babylon) συνεκλεκτὴ <WG4899> syneklektē chosen together with [you] , καὶ <WG2532> kai [as does] Μάρκος <WG3138> Markos Mark . ὁ <WG3588> ho - υἱός <WG5207> huios son μου <WG1473> mou my

Ἀσπάσασθε <WG782> Aspasasthe Greet ἀλλήλους <WG240> allēlous one another ἐν <WG1722> en with φιλήματι <WG5370> philēmati a kiss ἀγάπης <WG26> agapēs of love . Εἰρήνη <WG1515> Eirēnē Peace ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin of you πᾶσιν <WG3956> pasin to all τοῖς <WG3588> tois who [are] ἐν <WG1722> en in Χριστῷ <WG5547> Christō Christ . ( BYZ and TR include Amen.)
